quotes.quote: You can't be distracted by the noise of misinformation.
The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.
The difference between noise and music is in what the musician does with the sounds.
The noise resembles the roar of heavy, distant surf. Standing on the stirring ice one can imagine it is disturbed by the breathing and tossing of a mighty giant below.
Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice.
Noise is the most impertinent of all forms of interruption. It is not only an interruption, but also a disruption of thought.
Noise proves nothing. Often a hen who has merely laid an egg cackles as if she laid an asteroid.
Noise is an imposition on sanity, and we live in very noisy times.
NOISE, n. A stench in the ear. Undomesticated music. The chief product and authenticating sign of civilization.
The loudest noise in the world is silence.
Noise tri­umphs and reigns supreme over the sen­si­bil­ity of men.
The noise from good toast should reverberate in the head like the thunder of July.
If by noise you mean uncomfortable sound, then pop music is noise to me.
Nonsense and noise will oft prevail, When honor and affection fail.
There is always a certain noise in applause: even in the applause we give ourselves.
Noise and crowds have a way of siphoning our energy and distracting our attention, making prayer an added chore rather than a comforting relief
So great was the noise during the day that I used to lie awake at night listening to silence.
What is noise to the old order is harmony to the new.
Of all noises, I think music is the least disagreeable.
We are too connected. There's noise in our heads all the time.
Noise and activity are the refuges of the bereaved and the guilty.
And it's amazing how much noise people ignoring each other can make.
The signal is the truth. The noise is what distracts us from the truth.
Do not confound noise with fame. The man who is remembered, is not always honored.
That's another thing about Noise. Everything that's ever happened to you just keeps right on talking, for ever and ever.
We must never let the noise of the world overpower and overwhelm that still small voice.
Noises are like arrows pierced to a gentle soul when the mind is on a journey of thought.
There's a lot of noise in the world, and the Internet magnifies that energy.
You don't make a statement unless you make noise.
Noise is a parasite. Anything noisy is poorly designed.
